lines: Ngi ph’ iBhaibhele elikhanyisayo, Kuze ku thokozisw’ ohambayo
Ngi ph’ iBhaibhele ‘sithunyw’ esingcwele Lize nami li ngi khanyisele
Izithembiso nothando ndawonye, Ku zohlala phakade ku kunye
Ngi ph’ iBhaibhele nxa ku khon’ usizi, Nanxa umoya wami u pansi
Ngi ph’amazwi a khulunywa nguJesu, Kuze ku bonw ‘uMkhululi wethu
Ngi ph’ iBhaibhele ekhanyis’ indlela Lize li bonis’ ingozi lapha
Li yisiban’ esikhanyisa kahle; Ukuze ngi mbone ngi mlandele
Ngi ph’iBhaibhele yiso isibane Ozosiphakamis’ elibeni
Li nokukhanyisa kwasezulwini, Naphesheya kwalo iJordani
